name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:[protein]-L-glutamine (N5-glutamine)-methyltransferase
definition: Protein glutamine + S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> Protein N5-methyl-L-glutamine + S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine
comment: The enzyme ec 2.1.1.297 methylates peptide chain release factor 1 or 2 [KO:K02835 K02836]. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.298 methylates ribosomal protein L3 [KO:K02906].
